original_text: And Paul said, “John baptized with the baptism of repentance, telling the people to believe in the one who was to come after him, that is, Jesus.”
korean_text: 바울이 이르되 요한이 회개의 세례를 베풀며 백성에게 말하되 내 뒤에 오시는 이를 믿으라 하였으니 이는 곧 예수라 하거늘

sentences.original_text: John baptized with the baptism of repentance,
telling the people to believe in the one
who was to come after him,
